text: On the Trail of the Bremen Town Musicians () is a 1973 Soviet animated movie directed by Vasily Livanov.ПО СЛЕДАМ БРЕМЕНСКИХ МУЗЫКАНТОВ (1973)По следам Бременских музыкантов == Actors == * Muslim Magomayev - Troubadour, Detective and Atamansha * Elmira Zherzdeva - Princess * Gennady Gladkov - The King == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1973 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: On the Trail of the Bremen Town Musicians
